name: MARITIM 1 by CLINK
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
MARITIM 1 by CLINK is located in the Camins al Grau district of Valencia, 2.3 km from Malvarrosa Beach, 1.2 km from Puerto de Valencia and 3.4 km from Turia Gardens. The property is situated 3.7 km from L'Oceanografic, 3.7 km from Jardines de Monforte and 4.2 km from Norte Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 1.7 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4.7 km from the apartment, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from MARITIM 1 by CLINK.

name: Apartamento nuevo cerca de la playa y céntrico
description:
Situated in Valencia, 1.9 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 2.6 km from Patacona Beach, Apartamento nuevo cerca de la playa y céntrico offers air conditioning. The property is set 1.5 km from Puerto de Valencia, 3.5 km from Turia Gardens and 3.8 km from Jardines de Monforte. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 1.3 km away.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

L'Oceanografic is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Norte Train Station is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from Apartamento nuevo cerca de la playa y céntrico, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: CAPSULE INN VALENCIA
description_short: Shared dormitory room
description:
Well located in the Extramurs district of Valencia, CAPSULE INN VALENCIA is situated 1.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 2.8 km from Turia Gardens and 1.5 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Norte Train Station.

Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a dishwasher, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms include a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 1.8 km from the capsule hotel, while Jardines de Monforte is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from CAPSULE INN VALENCIA.

name: Apartment Plaza de la Merced
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Apartment Plaza de la Merced features accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. This apartment provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The accommodation offers a lift and luggage storage space for guests.

At the apartment complex, units have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A stovetop and coffee machine are also offered.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Apartment Plaza de la Merced include Norte Train Station, Church of Saint Nicolás and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Valencia Center
description:
This modern hotel features a small rooftop pool and terrace, open all year. Located opposite Valencia’s botanical gardens and the Nuevo Centro shopping centre, it includes a gym and sauna.

The soundproofed rooms at the NH Valencia Center are stylishly decorated and have air conditioning as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with NH amenities.

Túria Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk from NH Valencia Center and offers easy access to the centre of Valencia. Guests receive a 20% discount on public parking with direct access to the hotel.

The NH Valencia Center’s restaurant serves international and Mediterranean dishes for lunch and dinner. Guests can also enjoy an early-riser and a healthy Antiox breakfast.

name: El Coso
description_short: Private suite
description:
This new hotel is set just off Las Arenas beach, occupying location in Valencia’s 21st-century expansion, beside the Veles e Vents building.

At the heart of Valencia’s new development, Hotel El Coso features facilities for you to enjoy that include a hot tub or hydromassage bath.

In addition, all guestrooms are equipped with free internet and plasma-screen TVs with over 40 channels.

Guests can enjoy the local speciality paella or the mediterranean dishes in the hotel’s 2 restaurants.

name: Plaza Negrito Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 52m²
description:
Plaza Negrito Apartments offers accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Every room includes a balcony with city views.

Each unit comes with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Church of Saint Nicolás, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Plaza Negrito Apartments.

name: San Miguel, Luxury apartments.
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
San Miguel, Luxury apartments. Provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. It is located 200 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás and offers a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, as well as a kitchenware and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from San Miguel, Luxury apartments..

name: Hotel Dimar
description:
Situated in Valencia’s Cánovas Square, this modern design hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room at Hotel Dimar has tea and coffee making facilities and flat-screen TV.

The Hotel Dimar’s air-conditioned rooms have elegant décor and wooden flooring. They all offer a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Hotel Dimar’s restaurant, while sandwiches and pastries are available in the bar. There is also a range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets.

Set next to the Turia Gardens, Hotel Dimar is within a 15-minute walk of Valencia Cathedral. Colon Metro Station is 600 metres away, while the famous City of Arts and Sciences is just 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Valencia Center
description:
Hotel Valencia Center is 400 metres from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, 3 km from the city centre. It offers a sauna, gym and outdoor pool, and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Ayora Metro Station, which connects to the city centre and the airport. It takes 5 minutes by bus to the beach or city centre, and there is a bus stop opposite the hotel.

All air-conditioned/heated (according season) rooms have a satellite TV, safe and minibar

The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

There is a 24-hour front desk and you can hire a car at the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Macflats Valencia Puerto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 57m²
description:
These smart and well-equipped apartments are located just a short walk from Valencias port area and a 10-minute walk from Arenas beach.

Puerto Valencia boasts apartments equipped with kitchens, where you can prepare your own meals and enjoy dining in the company of all the family.

Start your day with breakfast in the apartment, before strolling down to the port area of the city, where you can enjoy the fresh sea air. During the summer months, you can take the short walk to the nearby beach area, and spend the day relaxing on the sand and sunbathing.

name: Sercotel Sorolla Palace
description:
The elegant Sorolla Palace is 50 meters from Valencia's Congress Centre, offering a beautiful terrace with an outdoor pool,It also features a hot tub, gym and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Sercotel have bright, attractive décor and include air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The upper floors of the Sorolla Palace enjoy impressive views of the city, and the outdoor pool contains a retractable roof that covers it in winter, spring and autumn.

In the cafeteria L'Estany, which prepares tapas and a wide variety of cocktails, Mediterranean and international dishes are served.

The Sercotel Sorolla Palace is located a 5-minute walk from the Beniferri metro station, which connects in 9 stops with the City of Arts and Sciences. Beniferri Park is just 100 meters from the hotel.

name: Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach
description:
Set in Valencia, 800 metres from Playa de las Arenas, Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 1.9 km from Patacona Beach. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a patio. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

name: Soho Boutique Turia
description:
Located in Valencia, within 500 metres of Turia Gardens and less than 1 km of González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Soho Boutique Turia provides accommodation with a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Jardines de Monforte.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Soho Boutique Turia each room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Norte Train Station and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Soho Boutique Turia.

name: Bet Apartments - Reig
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Jardines de Monforte, Bet Apartments - Reig provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.3 km from Turia Gardens and 2.9 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The aparthotel features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 1.9 km from the aparthotel, while Norte Train Station is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Bet Apartments - Reig.

name: Bet Apartments - City Suites Abastos
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Set in Valencia, within 1.6 km of Church of Saint Nicolás and 3.2 km of Bioparc Valencia, Bet Apartments - City Suites Abastos features free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms boast a kitchen and a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Norte Train Station.

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Valencia Botanical Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Bet Apartments - City Suites Abastos.

name: Flatsforyou Turia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
Located 800 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados in Valencia, Flatsforyou Turia provides accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower.

Popular points of interest near Flatsforyou Turia include Jardines de Monforte, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia, 10 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Eurostars Rey Don Jaime
description:
Eurostars Rey Don Jaime is located opposite the pretty River Túria Gardens and Valencia's Palau de la Música. It features a roof top terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout.

The impressive 14-floor tower of the Rey Don Jaime offers rooms with air conditioning, heating and satellite TV for an extra cost. All rooms have a large wardrobe.

The City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in around 15 minutes, on foot from the hotel. Valencia’s seafront and the closest beach are 3.6 km away. The local bus 19 stops at the corner of Eurostars Rey Don Jaime and connects with the city centre and the beach.

name: Ilunion Valencia 4
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi throughout, Ilunion Valencia 4 is just 800 metres from Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos and a 3-minute walk from Beniferri Metro Stop.

Rooms are decorated with warm colors and provide an integrated seating area, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also include a sofa, a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. Some of them provide stunning city views.

The Ilunion Valencia 4 serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes. Guests can enjoy relax in the seasonal swimming pool. Private parking is available for an extra cost.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

Guests will find a shopping centre and a range of restaurants within a 15-minute walk of Ilunion Valencia 4. Valencia’s Historic Centre is 3 km from the property, and Malvarrosa Beach is 15 minutes' drive away. Valencia Airport is a 40-minute metro ride away.

Supplements per night apply. Guests should contact the hotel to check and confirm availability of room for a reservation with pet. Hotel will check there's availability and that room complies with specifications needed. Pets are only allowed in "Pet Friendly Double room" room type. Pets are not allowed in the other types of rooms. Once in the establishment, guests will receive the access regulations, which they must read and approve.”

Parking is reserved upon arrival at the hotel and always subject to availability.

name: Apartamentos Mercado Central
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Apartamentos Mercado Central provides accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodation is 800 metres from Norte Train Station. The apartment has private entrance.

At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Church of Saint Nicolás, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Apartamentos Mercado Central.

name: Hi Valencia Canovas
description:
Located just 100 metres from Paseo de la Alameda Boulevard,  Hi Valencia Canovas is less than 1 km from Valencia's old town. It offers simple, attractive accommodation with shared or private bathrooms.

All rooms at the  Hi Valencia Canovas offer bright, modern décor and each has heating, a fan and a TV.

The guest house offers breakfast for an extra cost at a café located 100 metres from the property. The property is within walking distance of a good selection of cafés, bars and restaurants. Valencia’s old town is less than 1 km away.

The Carmen district and Valencia Cathedral are less than 1 km from the property. Colón Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away and is 1 stop from Valencia Railway Station. Malvarrosa Beach can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.

name: Bet Apartments - Viveros Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 20m²
description:
Situated in Valencia, a 15-minute walk from Facultat Metro Station and right next to Viveros Park, Bet Apartments - Viveros Apartments features a shared indoor pool and offers apartments with free WiFi.

Air-conditioned and heated, the apartments include a seating area with a flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a washing machine, hob, and microwave.

There is a private bathroom in each apartment and it includes a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Estacio del Nord Train Station is a 25-minute walk from the property. City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in 7 minutes by car, and a 25-minute tram ride takes you to Malvarrosa Beach.

name: Palau Apartments Valencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Turia Gardens, Palau Apartments Valencia is a recently renovated property located in Valencia and provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.7 km from Jardines de Monforte and 2.1 km from Norte Train Station. The aparthotel features family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 1.8 km from Palau Apartments Valencia, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Ilunion Aqua 4
description:
This design hotel is conveniently set in front of Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences, and the Oceanographic Park. Free WiFi is available throughout.

Stylish rooms at Ilunion Aqua 4 feature wooden floors and modern décor in warm colours, as well as air conditioning. They all include a large work desk, safe, minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms offer panoramic views over Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences. The bathroom features marble finishes and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A varied breakfast is served daily, and à-la-carte and set menus are available for lunch and dinner. There are also special products for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours.

The Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre features a wide range of shops, a spa and a fitness centre.

Ilunion Aqua 4 is 2 km from the centre of Valencia and 1 km from the harbour. Buses to the city centre stop 50 metres away. The Malvarrosa and Las Areas beaches are a few minutes' drive from the hotel and Manises Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away. Discounted rates are offered for parking at the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

name: Cabanyal Apartment C - Beachside Charm & Design
description:
Set in Valencia, 1.2 km from Playa de las Arenas and 1.9 km from Malvarrosa Beach, Cabanyal Apartment C - Beachside Charm & Design offers air conditioning. The property is around 700 metres from Puerto de Valencia, 3.8 km from L'Oceanografic and 4.1 km from Turia Gardens. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Patacona Beach.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Jardines de Monforte is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Norte Train Station is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Cabanyal Apartment C - Beachside Charm & Design.

name: Valencia Luxury - Sea Port II
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
In the Camins al Grau district of Valencia, close to Puerto de Valencia, Valencia Luxury - Sea Port II has a rooftop pool and a washing machine. Featuring private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a fitness room.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is featured. The property offers city views.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Valencia Luxury - Sea Port II include Turia Gardens, L'Oceanografic and Mestalla Stadium. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: NH Ciudad de Valencia
description:
Located in a quiet area of Valencia, NH Ciudad de Valencia is 15 minutes’ walk from the City of Arts and Sciences and the Port where the Americas Cup takes place.

The modern rooms at the Hotel Ciudad de Valencia feature parquet floors, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms come with a work desk.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours and live shows. There are also car and bicycle rental services available from the front desk.

Maritim-Serreria and Ayora Metro Stations are within 250 metres, offering access to the beach, the city centre and the airport.

name: Arena Zone Hotel
description:
Arena Zone Hotel is an urban hotel located in Valencia, 1.2 km from the City of Arts and Sciences. It offers accommodation with private parking and a terrace.

This 3-star hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. There is a reception from 10AM to 10PM and concierge and guest service 23Hs/day.

All rooms include a desk and flat screen TV, chromecast and 600 megabyte internet. Rooms include wardrobe.

The Arena Zone Hotel offers a rich breakfast with a wide variety, provided by the restaurant located at our facilities, with direct access from our reception.

Oceanogràfic is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 2.5 km away. We are also a few meters from the L10 and the El Saler shopping center. Our location is unbeatable. And that's not all, just over 10 kilometers away is El Saler and l'Arbre del Gos beaches, and about 14 kilometers away from La Devesa beach.

The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Arena Zone Hotel. Airport shuttle service is provided at an additional cost.

Couples love the location — Gave it an 8.3 for two-person trips.

Nearby beaches: El Saler beach, l'Arbre del Gos beach and La Devesa beach

name: Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique
description:
Located 100 metres from the Turia Gardens, in Valencia’s Old Town, Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique offers stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is 200 metres from Torre de Serranos City Gate.

Featuring free WiFi, each spacious air-conditioned room has a minibar, flat-screen TV and views of the city. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique has a 24-hour reception, as well as a ticket service and tour desk. Bike rental and car can be organised for you, and an airport shuttle service is available.

The Lonja de Seda Silk Exchange and Valencia Central Market are less than 10 minutes’ walk away from the hotel. Norte Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Plaza Negrito Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 52m²
description:
Plaza Negrito Apartments offers accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Every room includes a balcony with city views.

Each unit comes with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Church of Saint Nicolás, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Plaza Negrito Apartments.

name: Habitaciones Barra89
description:
Offering an on-site restaurant, Habitaciones Barra89 is located in Valencia. Set 400 metres from Patraix Metro Station, this property offers single and double rooms with free WiFi.

All rooms in this guest house are heated and will provide you with a TV and fan, and all rooms include a desk and a minibar. Bed linen and towels are provided, and there are shared bathrooms with a shower.

Valencia Nord Train Station is a 15-minute drive from Habitaciones Barra89, and you can reach Valencia Historic Centre in 3 metro stops. Valencia Airport is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Valencia Oceanic Affiliated by Meliá
description:
Overlooking Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International offers a gym, an outdoor pool and a sun terrace. Each bright, air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a laptop safe.

Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International's soundproofed rooms are simply decorated in warm tones. They all have a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel offers a varied buffet breakfast, and Mediterranean dishes are served in the à la carte restaurant. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International also has a lobby bar and a poolside snack bar.

El Corte Inglés Department Store can be found right next to the hotel, and the City of Arts and Sciences is a 5-minute walk away. The beach is a 10-minute bus ride away, and city’s historic centre is within 3 km.

name: Catalonia Excelsior
description:
Catalonia Excelsior is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just a few metres from Plaza del ayuntamiento Square. This elegant hotel features a café, free Wi-Fi access, rooms with satellite TVs.

The Excelsior’s rooms are bright and air conditioned. Each has air conditioning, a small fridge and a well-equipped bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a daily, buffet breakfast in the Catalonia’s café. There is a range of cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Valencia Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the Excelsior whilst the Plaza de Toros Bullring is less than one kilometre away. The nearest Metro Station, Colón can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: L&H Gran Vía Valencia
description:
Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of city, L&H Gran Vía Valencia is located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at L&H Gran Vía Valencia have a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.

Popular points of interest near L&H Gran Vía Valencia include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Medium Valencia
description:
Situated 700 metres from Valencia's impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this design hotel offers a gym and seasonal outdoor pool. The spacious rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Each air-conditioned room at the Medium Valencia has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some have views of the spectacular City of Arts and Sciences.

Mediterranean cuisine served in Hotel Medium Valencia’s on-site restaurant. The hotel also has a lounge bar in the lobby.

The Medium Valencia is around 2.5 km from the historic centre of Valencia, and 4 km from the city’s beaches. The hotel offers private on-site parking, and frequent bus services stop nearby.

name: San Miguel, Luxury apartments.
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
San Miguel, Luxury apartments. Provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. It is located 200 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás and offers a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, as well as a kitchenware and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from San Miguel, Luxury apartments..

name: Hotel Malcom and Barret
description:
Hotel Malcom and Barret is located in Valencia, 5 minutes' drive from the City of Arts and Sciences and Estació del Nord Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a 40” flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Hotel Malcom and Barret come with a safe and a desk. The private bathroom has a shower, magnifying mirror, hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel offers a restaurant with a buffet breakfast.

Hotel Malcom and Barret also has a 24-hour reception, 5 meeting rooms and luggage storage.

There are various restaurants, bars and nightclubs in the area. Valencia’s Old Town is 2 km away and can be reached in 30 minutes by foot, while Malvarrosa Beach is 5 km away.

Private on-site parking is available for an extra cost. You can drive to Valencia Airport in around 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Miramar Valencia
description:
This small, contemporary-styled hotel overlooks the Mediterranean Sea from its setting at the Playa de Las Arenas Beach, near the Marina Real Juan Carlos I in Valencia city. Free WiFi is available.

Located on the beach, the hotel's Lounge-Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails. The bar is open all day long.

Modern rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Valencia city centre can be reached in around 20 minutes' drive or 30 minutes by public transport.

name: Valencia Luxury - Calma Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 42m²
description:
Boasting rooftop pool, Valencia Luxury - Calma Beach Apartments is situated on the beachfront in Valencia. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a lift and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available in the kitchen, as well as a kettle. The units have a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Guests are welcome to relax in the on-site bar, while packed lunches are also available upon request.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Playa de las Arenas, Malvarrosa Beach and Puerto de Valencia. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 14 km from Valencia Luxury - Calma Beach Apartments.

name: B&B HOTEL Valencia Ciudad de las Ciencias
description:
Located around 1.5 km from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this hotel offers modern rooms and free WiFi. There is a 24-hour reception.

The modern rooms have a flat-screen TV. Central heating and air conditioning are available depending on the season. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Rooms are cleaned every day.

A varied buffet breakfast is served daily , there is also a lobby bar.

The centre of Valencia is 3 km from B&B HOTEL Valencia Ciudad de las Ciencias and Las Arenas Beach is 5 km away. The Feria Valencia is 20 minutes' drive away. It is 800 metres from La Fe Hospital.

name: Primus Valencia
description:
This ultra-modern hotel is just 600 metres from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences. It has a spa, gym, an all-year round outdoor swimming pool and its elegant rooms feature plasma satellite TV and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Valencia Primus have attractive wooden flooring and bright, modern décor. Each one is soundproofed and has a work desk and laptop safe.

For a surcharge, guests have access to the hotel’s extensive spa, which features a dynamic swimming pool, cold pool, hot tub, sauna and hammam. A range of massage and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. There is also a fitness centre.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Mediterranean food with a modern twist. It has an outdoor terrace, and there is also a café-bar overlooking the charming decked garden.

Aqua Multiespacio Shopping Centre is just opposite the Primus Valencia. There is a bus stop 75 metres away, connecting you with the city centre and beaches.

name: Blanq Carmen Hotel
description:
Set in a historic building that still preserves its original façade, just 25 metres from the Serranos Towers, Blanq Carmen Hotel is located in Valencia’s old town. Free WiFi is available.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel feature satellite TV and a seating area. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel features a seasonal rooftop terrace with a plunge pool.

Blanq Carmen Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from the cathedral and Miguelete belfry, 5 minutes from the central market, silk market and one of the most important financial and commercial areas.

name: HQ Rooms Apartments San Vicente
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Located in Valencia, HQ Rooms Apartments San Vicente features accommodation with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

Each unit has a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, as well as a microwave and kettle. There is a private bathroom with bath in all units, along with free toiletries and a hair dryer.

A bicycle rental service is available at this property and cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Mercado Central, Valencia is 1.5 km from HQ Rooms Apartments San Vicente. Valencia Airport is 10 km away.

name: COOL LOFTS center valencia
description:
Situated in Valencia, 700 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás and 1.1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, COOL LOFTS center valencia offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property features inner courtyard views and is 2.6 km from Jardines de Monforte and 1.9 km from Turia Gardens. The guest house has family rooms.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchenette with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the guest house, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Norte Train Station and Quart Towers. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from COOL LOFTS center valencia.

name: Nest Silence
description:
Situated in Valencia, 500 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás and 1.4 km from Turia Gardens, Nest Silence offers air conditioning. It is located 500 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and features a lift. The property is less than 1 km from Norte Train Station, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Valencia Silk Exchange. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Nest Silence.

name: Eurostars Acteón
description:
Eurostars Acteón is 15 minutes’ walk from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences. Free WiFi is available at the hotel.

The spacious, soundproofed rooms feature large windows. The air-conditioned rooms also have a satellite TV, a work desk and a safe. Private bathroom comes with a bath, a hairdryer and a hot towel rail.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is a café-bar. It offers a daily breakfast buffet, and room service is available. Guests receive a welcome drink.

Eurostars Acteón has a 24-hour front desk where car or bicycle rental service can be assisted. The on-site parking is available at an additional charge.

Buses to Valencia city centre, 5 minutes' drive away, stop in front of the hotel, and Ayora Metro Station is 650 metres away. Playa de La Malvarrosa Beach and the Juan Carlos I Marina are about 3 minutes’ drive away. Aqua and El Saler Shopping Centres are 15 minutes' walk away.

name: Ilunion Aqua 3
description:
The design-driven Ilunion Aqua 3 is located just 300 metres from Valencia’s City of Art and Sciences and the Oceanographic Park. It offers a modern rooms, a 24-hour reception, and free WiFi.

The hotel is located above the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre, which features a multi-screen cinema, a wide range of clothing shops a spa and a fitness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Ilunion Aqua 3 feature wooden floors and modern décor in warm colours. They all include a work desk, safe and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom features marble finishes and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel has a bright and modern restaurant, where breakfast is served each morning. The restaurant also offers à-la-carte and set menus for lunch and dinner, and it features special menus for guests with allergies.

There is a bus stop just 50 metres from the hotel, from which there is a regular service to the city centre and the beach. The Malvarrosa and Las Arenas beaches are just a few minutes drive from the hotel, and Manises Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away. Discounted rates are offered for parking at the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Late check-out until 12:00 is offered to all guests free of charge.

name: Las Arenas Balneario Resort
description:
This 5-star resort has a superb seafront location with direct access to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach. The Las Arenas Balneario Resort features 2 seasonal outdoor pools surrounded by loungers, and a luxurious spa.

All rooms at this design hotel are elegantly decorated with neutral colours. They include free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV.

The Sorolla restaurant serves traditional but creative cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light refreshments are available from the pool bar.

The spa at Las Arenas Balneario Resort Valencia includes a heated indoor pool with views to the gardens. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym.

The Palacio de la Música and the America’s Cup Port are a short walk from the hotel. There are 2 metro stations and many bus stops nearby the Hotel Las Arenas Balneario Resort.

name: Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
A sustainable property, Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites is situated in Valencia near Jardines de Monforte, Turia Gardens and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 2022, you will have access to free WiFi. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 2.4 km from Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites, while Church of Saint Nicolás is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Calatrava by Alma Suites
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 43m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the river, Calatrava by Alma Suites is a sustainable apartment in Valencia, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Bioparc Valencia. With a garden, the 4-star apartment has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy city views.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath, shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge and kettle are also provided.

Church of Saint Nicolás is 3 km from the apartment, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Calatrava by Alma Suites.

name: Atico Tapineria
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Valencia, 400 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 300 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Atico Tapineria offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Turia Gardens.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Atico Tapineria include Norte Train Station, Jardines de Monforte and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Beach Apartments Valencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
Beach Apartments Valencia features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Valencia, 1.2 km from Playa de las Arenas, 2.1 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 600 metres from Puerto de Valencia. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Bike hire and car hire are available at this apartment and the area is popular for pub crawls.

L'Oceanografic is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Turia Gardens is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Beach Apartments Valencia.

name: Sercotel Valencia Alameda 41
description:
Hotel Valencia Alameda 41 is set in Valencia, 200 mts from City of Arts & Sciences. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant for the breakfast service. The rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel is located on the first floor.

Rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and include a work desk and microwave.

Breakfast is available each morning and includes à la carte and Full English or Irish options.

A business center is available on site.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.5 km from Hotel Valencia Alameda. Valencia Airport is 11.1 km from the property.

name: Lindala
description:
Located in Valencia, 1.4 km from Puerto de Valencia, Lindala provides air-conditioned rooms and a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a garden and features a terrace.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. At Lindala every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Malvarrosa beach is 900 meters from the hotel, and Oceanografic is just 2.3 km away.
City of Arts & Sciences is 3.1 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 16 km from Lindala.

name: Macflats Valencia Puerto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 57m²
description:
These smart and well-equipped apartments are located just a short walk from Valencias port area and a 10-minute walk from Arenas beach.

Puerto Valencia boasts apartments equipped with kitchens, where you can prepare your own meals and enjoy dining in the company of all the family.

Start your day with breakfast in the apartment, before strolling down to the port area of the city, where you can enjoy the fresh sea air. During the summer months, you can take the short walk to the nearby beach area, and spend the day relaxing on the sand and sunbathing.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
description:
This design hotel is located just 5 minutes’ walk from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences. It offers a gym, sauna, indoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a plasma TV, free Wi-Fi and pillow menu.

NH Valencia Las Artes is opposite El Saler Shopping Centre and 5 km from Malvarrosa Beach. There are good bus connections with the city centre, and easy access to the A-7 Motorway.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Valencian food with a modern twist. There is a special children’s menu.

NH Las Artes has other facilities for children including a games room. The 24-hour reception also offers currency exchange and bicycle rental.

name: Parker The Urban Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Parker The Urban Flats are located just outside Valencia’s old town. They are stylish apartments with modern décor, a flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi.

The Parker The Urban Flats open-plan apartments feature white, minimalist design and contemporary furniture. The kitchenette comes with a ceramic hob and microwave.

Staff at the property’s reception can help booking tickets for guided tours and live shows. The cleaning service is every 3 days.

The property is located just 50 metres from the Parque de la Cultura, where you will find the city’s library. You can easily explore the rest of the city using the metro network – the nearest stop to the property is Ángel Guimera, just a 50-metre walk away.

name: COOL LOFTS ALAMEDA VALENCIA
description:
COOL LOFTS ALAMEDA VALENCIA has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Valencia, less than 1 km from Jardines de Monforte, 1.9 km from Norte Train Station and 1.5 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. There is a private entrance at the guest house for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Turia Gardens is 600 metres away.

Each unit has a patio, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the guest house, units include bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 1.7 km from the guest house, while Puerto de Valencia is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from COOL LOFTS ALAMEDA VALENCIA.

name: SingularStays Botanico29
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 78m²
description:
Located just 50 metres from Valencia´s Botanic Gardens, SingularStays Botanico29 offers modern, air-conditioned apartments in a 19th century building. Torres de Quart is 200 metres away.

Each bright apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a TV, as well as a full kitchen with a hob and kettle. Some apartments have a furnished balcony or terrace. Bathrooms include a bath or shower, and towels and bed linen are included.

In 10 minutes you can walk to La Lonja de la Seda, Valencia Cathedral and Central Market. A selection of shops and restaurants are within a 1-minute walk.

Bioparc Valencia is 2.2 km from SingularStays Botanico29. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from SingularStays Botanico29.

name: FLORIT FLATS - The Serreria Rooms
description:
Situated in Valencia, 1.2 km from Playa de las Arenas, FLORIT FLATS - The Serreria Rooms features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. There is a private entrance at the guest house for the convenience of those who stay. The guest house has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the guest house, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the guest house offers a baby safety gate.

Malvarrosa Beach is 1.5 km from FLORIT FLATS - The Serreria Rooms, while Patacona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach
description:
Set in Valencia, 800 metres from Playa de las Arenas, Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 1.9 km from Patacona Beach. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a patio. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

name: Rest Valencia
description:
Situated within 2.8 km of Jardines de Monforte and 2.9 km of Turia Gardens in Valencia, Rest Valencia features accommodation with seating area. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.3 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Church of Saint Nicolás is less than 1 km away.

At the aparthotel, every unit comes with a desk. Some units also have a well-fitted kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a fridge, and a stovetop. All units have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Norte Train Station and Valencia Botanical Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Rest Valencia.

name: Mon Suites Catedral
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 25m²
description:
Offering modern, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi, Mon Suites Catedral is set in the centre of Valencia, 50 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Private parking is available for an extra cost.

Decorated in cream and grey tones, apartments include parquet floors and lounges with a sofa and flat-screen cable TV. Their kitchens are equipped with an oven, fridge and hob. Some of the apartments have a terrace.

Breakfast options are available in places nearby. Plaza de la Reina Square is next to the property and offers several restaurants. There are many dining options and bars in the surrounding area.

La Lonja de la Seda is just 350 metres from Mon Suites Catedral. Both Valencia Bus Station and Valencia Train Station can be reached in 20 minutes’ walk.

name: Emma Apartment Central
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
In the Olivereta district of Valencia, close to Norte Train Station, Emma Apartment Central features a terrace and a washing machine. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Church of Saint Nicolás is 2 km away.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Bioparc Valencia is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Emma Apartment Central.

name: Eurostars Gran Valencia
description:
This modern hotel, next to Valencia’s Congress Centre, offers views over the city centre and free Wi-Fi. The Eurostars has a gym, sauna and rooftop pool.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Gran Valencia feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar.

The hotel has a bar, and the restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, such as fresh seafood. Room service is also available. A packed breakfast is served in the room.

The Eurostars Gran Valencia offers a laundy and dry cleaning service. Valencia's Old Town is 3 km away. There are Metro, train and bus stops nearby.

name: Valencia Luxury - Malvarrosa Beach
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 102m²
description:
Offering a shared terrace with stunning sea views, Valencia Luxury Las Arenas Beach apartment is located in Valencia, just 300 metres from Valencia Luxury - Malvarrosa Beach.

This stylish, air-conditioned apartment comes with 3 bedrooms decorated in white tones and 2 bathrooms with a hairdryer. The living area includes sofas, a TV and DVD player. The modern kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine and a dining area.

You will find many restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is 50 metres away.

Marítim-Serrería Metro Station is a 20-minute walk away and The City of Arts and Sciences is 3.4 km away.  Valencia Airport is 16 km from Valencia Luxury Las Arenas Beach.

name: Senator Parque Central Hotel
description:
Senator Parque Central Hotel is situated in central Valencia, 15 minutes’ walk from Xativa Station and the Old Town. This modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and sauna.

Rooms at the Senator Parque Central are air conditioned and soundproofed, and feature a safe. A hairdryer and amenities are included in the private bathrooms. 2 free bottles of mineral water are provided upon arrival.

The Senator has an air-conditioned dining room, where a daily buffet breakfast is served. There is also a bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk.

Las Arenas Beach and Valencia Port are 5 km from the hotel, and regular public bus services stop outside the hotel. There are also many shops and bars in the surrounding streets. The nearest airport is Valencia airport, 10.5 km from the property.

name: La Seda Stay
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
La seda stay offers accommodation situated in Valencia, 800 metres from Barrio del Carmen and with a parking place.

The City of Arts & Sciences and the Oceanografic are within 3 km and 3.6 km of the apartment, and free WiFi is provided.

This 3-bedroom apartment will provide you with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, air conditioning and a living room. The apartment also provides guests with a fitted kitchen including a toaster and a coffee machine. There are also 2 bathrooms one featuring a shower and the second one a bath tub and bidet.

Puerto de Valencia is 5 km from the apartment, while Quart Towers is 100 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from La seda stay.

name: Reinapart Patacona Beach 46
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Featuring private pool, Reinapart Patacona Beach 46 is located on the beachfront in Valencia. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and a bidet. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

The apartment also provides an indoor pool and a fitness centre for guests to relax in.

Popular points of interest near Reinapart Patacona Beach 46 include Patacona Beach, Malvarrosa Beach and Port Saplaya Beach. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Kramer
description:
The Hotel Kramer is situated 3.5 km from the centre of Valencia, 300 metres from Turia Metro Station. It features a bar, rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi access throughout.

The Hotel Kramer features simple décor and wooden flooring. Its air-conditioned rooms have TV with international channels, bathrooms with amenities and a safety deposit box.

Guests can make use of the hotel’s 24-hour reception and luggage storage. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Valencia and arrange car, or bicycle rental.

The hotel is just over 1 km from Valencia’s Exhibition Centre and the famous City of Arts and Sciences is a 15-minute drive away. The city’s airport is less than 10 km away.

name: The Westin Valencia
description:
This exclusive hotel is housed in one of Valencia’s most impressive Modernist buildings, 1 km from the Cathedral. It includes an 850m² spa and air-conditioned rooms with Art Deco design.

All rooms at the The Westin Valencia feature satellite TV, the exclusive Westin Heavenly Bed and a tea/coffee maker. The bathroom comes with hairdryer and bathrobe.

The Westin’s Wellness Health has a 25m² indoor therapy pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, experience showers and fitness centre. There are 8 separate treatment rooms, as well as a relaxation area.

Westin Valencia’s Rosemarino restaurant serves a buffet breakfast. El Jardí restaurant offers delicious Mediterranean cuisine and provides a relaxing setting for drinks, while the h-club Valencia serves cocktails.

The Westin Valencia lies 300 metres from the Mestalla Football Stadium. There are 3 metro stations in the local area.

name: SH Valencia Palace
description:
Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi.

SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away.

There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Barracart Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Offering free WiFi, Apartamentos Barracart is situated in Valencia, 800 metres from Puerto de Valencia. It is 12 minutes' walk from Platja Del Cabanyal Beach. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.2 km away.

The accommodation is equipped with a flat-screen TV. All units have a fully-equipped kitchenette. A microwave and coffee machine are also offered. Every unit comes with a private bathroom with a shower. Towels are provided.

Oceanografic is 2.2 km from Apartamentos Barracart, while Barrio del Carmen is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Apartamentos Barracart.

name: Vincci Palace
description:
Vincci Palace is located in central Valencia, 5 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral. It is an attractive design hotel offering elegant rooms with satellite TV and free internet access.

The Hotel Vincci Palace serves a buffet breakfast, which includes gluten-free products. There is a stylish on-site café selling refreshments and snacks, and a wide variety of restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Meeting and conference rooms are also available at the Vincci Palace.

The hotel has excellent transport links, with 2 bus stops outside the hotel and Colón Metro Station located just 5 minutes’ walk away. From here there is a direct service to Valencia Airport.

name: Palau de Palomar - PalomarGroup
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
Just 150 metres from Valencia’s Lonja de la Seda Silk Exchange, Palau de Palomar - PalomarGroup offers modern apartments overlooking the old town’s charming streets. They are set in a restored building, which maintains its marble staircase and a patio with original 18th-century murals.

Palau de Palomar - PalomarGroup apartments are spacious and have stylish décor. The living room has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes with a microwave, fridge, an electric hob, toaster and a coffee maker. Free WiFi is provided.

The apartments are set in Valencia’s Barrio del Carmen district, 150 metres from Plaza de la Reina and 300 metres from Valencia Cathedral. There is a range of bars and restaurants nearby.

Estación del Norte Railway Station is just 700 metres from the apartments. You can reach the famous City of Arts and Sciences in 20 minutes by bus.

name: Goerlich by Alma Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 32m²
description:
Goerlich by Alma Suites offers accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Norte Train Station and a 5-minute walk from Church of Saint Nicolás. The apartment has family rooms.

All units come with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, a kitchenware and kettle. Some rooms have a balcony.

Shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding old town. Valencia’s Tourist Information Centre is just 500 metres from Oliveira Rooms.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

The themed rooms at Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach feature unique, contemporary decor. All have a TV and bathroom. Some offer a terrace, sea or garden views and spa bath or shower. All have free fast broadband internet connection via WiFi and cable.

Breakfast is served daily and the Sabbia by Gabbeach restaurant offers a fusion of modern international and Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a pub which closes at 03:00. The property offers banquet facilities and meeting rooms.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops on the same street as the Sabbia by Gabbeach.

At Sabbia by Gabbeach we practice Hatha Yoga under the sun rays and the sea breeze.

Buses to the centre pass from a stop opposite the hotel, and the Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències is 3 km away. Ferries to Mallorca, Menorca and Ibiza all leave from the port. The Sabbia by Gabbeach is 300 metres from the Marina Real Tram Stop and Metro Station.

There is a communal lounge area with tea and coffee facilities. Laundry services are also available at an extra cost.

name: Caro Hotel
description:
The unique Caro Hotel is housed in a 19th-century palace in central Valencia, just 200 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Combining historical features with modern design, it has an outdoor pool open all year round.

Designed by Francesc Rifé, each of the elegant rooms in the Caro is totally individual, with exquisite touches of minimalist design. All have a flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioning and a free minibar. The bathrooms include Bvlgari toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers.

The cuisine of restaurant Alma del Temple offers a relaxed service that based on traditional ingredients and gives a protagonism to the kitchen.

Architecturally unique, parts of Caro Hotel date from up to 2000 years ago. Original features include a 2nd-century Roman mosaic, part of the 13th-century Arabic city walls and Gothic arches. The façade dates from the 19th century.

Plaza de la Virgen and Valencia's basilica are within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. La Lonja de la Seda, the medieval market and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a 10-minute walk away.
